original_text: It shall dwell in his tabernacle, because it is none of his: brimstone shall be scattered upon his habitation.
korean_text: 그에게 속하지 않은 자가 그의 장막에 거하리니 유황이 그의 처소에 뿌려질 것이며

sentences.original_text: It shall dwell in his tabernacle
because it is none of his
brimstone shall be scattered upon his habitation
